"aspectRatio": 0.6936790923824959, "maxImageSize": 640}}}, "articleBlock": "
✅ 跟著以下步驟跟著做

 💡 點擊：[下載課程範例](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1jCVrvBdfF2hBEA9Ns19VJHE83WHC-WqA "" "_blank")，回到WFduino畫面。


⓵  左上角選擇「檔案」

⓶ 再選擇「從電腦挑選」
[[☃ image 1]]

⓷ 在電腦裡找到課程範例「Scratch測試專案」
[[☃ image 2]]

⓸ 選擇「Scratch測試專案」。再點擊「開啟」

✅ 太棒了，我們成功匯入教學範例囉！

[[☃ image 4]]", "expandable": false}}, "article-block 3": {"version": {"major": 0, "minor": 0}, "type": "article-block", "id": "article-block 3", "graded": false, "options": {"expanded": false, "blockTitle": "1️⃣ 使用WFduino3.0線上版", "background": "aliceblue", "widgets": {"image 1": {"version": {"major": 0, "minor": 0}, "type": "image", "id": "image 1", "graded": true, "options": {"box": [640, 308], "useBoxSize": false, "labels": [], "range": [[0, 10], [0, 10]], "backgroundImage": {"url": "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jerry914/Arduino-Learning-Resources/master/2-3/WFduino.jpg", "width": 1904, "height": 917}, "aspectRatio": 0.48161764705882354, "maxImageSize": 640}}, "image 2": {"version": {"major": 0, "minor": 0}, "type": "image", "id": "image 2", "graded": true, "options": {"box": [435, 219], "useBoxSize": false, "labels": [], "range": [[0, 10], [0, 10]], "backgroundImage": {"url": "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jerry914/Arduino-Learning-Resources/master/2-3/2-3-2.jpg", "width": 625, "height": 314}, "aspectRatio": 0.5024, "maxImageSize": 640}}}, "articleBlock": "✅ [開啟WFduino3.0線上版](https://cs101.page.link/wfd3 "" "_blank")

[[[☃ image 1]]](https://cs101.page.link/wfd3 "" "_blank")

💡 WFduino3.0是改寫自Scratch3.0的一套中介軟體，用來作為Scratch3與Arduino溝通的橋樑。

❗️ 操作Wfduino3.0線上版期間，請勿關閉WFduino3.0離線版

"height": 364}, "aspectRatio": 0.4972677595628415, "maxImageSize": 640}}}, "articleBlock": "✅ 選擇連接埠。

 若無法連接連接埠，可能是由於：

+ USB線與電腦或Arduino開發版沒有接好


+ 確認連接Arduino開發版的USB裝置驅動程式是否安裝成功（再次安裝提供上述的 CH34X驅動程式）


[[☃ image 1]]

燒錄韌體至Arduino開發版。


✅ 點選：功能 / 韌體更新 / WFduino / Arduino，並稍待一下。


[[☃ image 2]]

韌體更新中... 
請等待一下，切勿任意插拔Arduino。

[[☃ image 5]]


太棒了！ 韌體更新完成。

[[☃ image 3]]


✅ 再次選擇連接埠，顯示版本資訊 

呼！你已經成功安裝WFduino離線版，透過它我們將能與Arduino裝置進行溝通。

[[☃ image 4]]

"aspectRatio": 0.5367847411444142, "maxImageSize": 640}}}, "articleBlock": "✅ 選擇連接埠，找尋有 「CH34X ...」 的選項。

+ COM後方數字會因不同電腦而有所不同，例：COM4、COM5...

✅ 若無法連接連接埠，可能是由於：

+ USB線與電腦或Arduino開發版沒有接好

+ 確認連接Arduino開發版的USB裝置驅動程式是否安裝成功（再次安裝提供上述的 CH34X驅動程式）


[[☃ image 1]]

燒錄韌體至Arduino開發版。


✅ 點選：功能 / 韌體更新 / WFduino / Arduino，並稍待一下。


[[☃ image 2]]

太棒了！ 韌體更新完成。

[[☃ image 3]]


✅ 再次選擇連接埠，顯示版本資訊 

呼！你已經成功安裝WFduino離線版，透過它我們將能與Arduino裝置進行溝通。

[[☃ image 4]]", "expandable": false}}, "article-block 3": {"version": {"major": 0, "minor": 0}, "type": "article-block", "id": "article-block 3", "graded": false, "options": {"expanded": false, "blockTitle": "3️⃣ ", "background": "aliceblue", "widgets": {}, "articleBlock": "", "expandable": false}}, "article-block 2": {"version": {"major": 0, "minor": 0}, "type": "article-block", "id": "article-block 2", "graded": false, "options": {"expanded": false, "blockTitle": "2️⃣ 執行 WFdunio", "background": "aliceblue", "widgets": {"image 1": {"version": {"major": 0, "minor": 0}, "type": "image", "id": "image 1", "graded": true, "options": {"box": [435, 234], "useBoxSize": false, "labels": [], "range": [[0, 10], [0, 10]], "backgroundImage": {"url": "https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=2-2/2-2-5-w.jpg", "width": 731, "height": 394}, "aspectRatio": 0.5389876880984952, "maxImageSize": 640}}, "image 2": {"version": {"major": 0, "minor": 0}, "type": "image", "id": "image 2", "graded": true, "options": {"box": [435, 232], "useBoxSize": false, "labels": [], "range": [[0, 10], [0, 10]], "backgroundImage": {"url": "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jerry914/Arduino-Learning-Resources/master/2-2/2-2-3-w.jpg", "width": 735, "height": 392}, "aspectRatio": 0.5333333333333333, "maxImageSize": 640}}, "image 3": {"version": {"major": 0, "minor": 0}, "type": "image", "id": "image 3", "graded": true, "options": {"box": [435, 367], "useBoxSize": false, "labels": [], "range": [[0, 10], [0, 10]], "backgroundImage": {"url": "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jerry914/Arduino-Learning-Resources/master/5-2/5-2-3.png", "width": 600, "height": 506}, "aspectRatio": 0.8433333333333334, "maxImageSize": 640}}}, "articleBlock": "燒錄韌體至Arduino開發版。

[[☃ image 1]]", "expandable": false}}, "article-block 3": {"version": {"major": 0, "minor": 0}, "type": "article-block", "id": "article-block 3", "graded": false, "options": {"expanded": false, "blockTitle": "3️⃣ 程式積木-2", "background": "aliceblue", "widgets": {"image 1": {"version": {"major": 0, "minor": 0}, "type": "image", "id": "image 1", "graded": true, "options": {"box": [435, 1731], "useBoxSize": false, "labels": [], "range": [[0, 10], [0, 10]], "backgroundImage": {"url": "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jerry914/Arduino-Learning-Resources/master/5-4/5-4-2.png", "width": 858, "height": 3414}, "aspectRatio": 3.979020979020979, "maxImageSize": 640}}}, "articleBlock": "+ 重複執行，讓每顆LED逐漸增加亮度，然後再逐漸變暗，輪流執行。


+ 逐漸變亮與逐漸變暗的方式，是透過改變變數「呼吸」的值加以控制。

[[☃ image 1]]", "expandable": false}}, "article-block 2": {"version": {"major": 0, "minor": 0}, "type": "article-block", "id": "article-block 2", "graded": false, "options": {"expanded": false, "blockTitle": "2️⃣ 安裝USB驅動程式 (USB-TTL)", "background": "aliceblue", "widgets": {"image 1": {"version": {"major": 0, "minor": 0}, "type": "image", "id": "image 1", "graded": true, "options": {"box": [640, 336], "useBoxSize": false, "labels": [], "range": [[0, 10], [0, 10]], "backgroundImage": {"url": "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jerry914/Arduino-Learning-Resources/master/2-1/2-1-2.jpg", "width": 751, "height": 394}, "aspectRatio": 0.5246338215712384, "maxImageSize": 640}}, "image 2": {"version": {"major": 0, "minor": 0}, "type": "image", "id": "image 2", "graded": true, "options": {"box": [301, 254], "useBoxSize": true, "labels": [], "range": [[0, 10], [0, 10]], "backgroundImage": {"url": "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jerry914/Arduino-Learning-Resources/master/5-2/5-2-4.png", "width": 301, "height": 254}, "aspectRatio": 0.8433333333333334, "maxImageSize": 640}}, "image 3": {"version": {"major": 0, "minor": 0}, "type": "image", "id": "image 3", "graded": true, "options": {"box": [435, 367], "useBoxSize": false, "labels": [], "range": [[0, 10], [0, 10]], "backgroundImage": {"url": "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jerry914/Arduino-Learning-Resources/master/5-2/5-2-3.png", "width": 600, "height": 506}, "aspectRatio": 0.8433333333333334, "maxImageSize": 640}}}, "articleBlock": "✅ 執行下載的檔案，點擊 INSTALL  


[[☃ image 1]]


🔔下載完之後，電腦會需要重新啟動喔！", "expandable": false}}, "article-block 4": {"version": {"major": 0, "minor": 0}, "type": "article-block", "id": "article-block 4", "graded": false, "options": {"expanded": false, "blockTitle": "4️⃣ 應用說明", "background": "aliceblue", "widgets": {}, "articleBlock": "+ 調整燈光的亮度。

+ 喇叭的大小聲

+ 聲音頻率。
", "expandable": false}}}, "articleBlock": "
